channel.title: PI need help (challenging)
channel.description:
Hey guys, i need help.. this isn't challenging but, it's confusing to explain... ok. This involves combat assistant.. ok, i want to change the time someone gets attacked.. so usually when you hit a player it hits them at the right time. for example when a whip swings right when it swings at the players body, it hits them. i have that currently, i want to change it to this video below. the player gets hit right when the player swings the whip (beginning of the swing) the hp comes up right when the swing coems up first thing. heres the video,
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A6zo1nkus_w&feature=context-vrec
Remember, look at when the player gets hit and when the whip swings.
ESPECIALLY when the dds specs right in the beginning... instead at the right time. Also, i think it is in attack like speed or something. please help
HITTING EARLIER THEN USUALL..

Hey guys, i need help… this isn’t challenging but, it’s confusing to explain… ok.
